snippet: Mark L. Shurtleff, Utah’s Republican attorney general, opposes abortion and Obama’s health care law, but he championed a law that gives illegal immigrants state guest worker permits in Utah.
abstract: Mark L Shurtleff, Utah’s Republican attorney general, is a die-hard conservative on most social issues, but on immigration he sees things differently, and has championed a law that gives illegal immigrants state guest worker permits in Utah.
lead_paragraph: Mark L. Shurtleff, Utah’s Republican attorney general, opposes abortion and Obama’s health care law, but he championed a law that gives illegal immigrants state guest worker permits in Utah.

headline.seo: Utah Attorney General Is Die-Hard Conservative, but Not on Immigrants
headline.main: A Die-Hard Conservative, but Not on Immigrants
headline.print_headline: A Die-Hard Conservative, but Not on Immigrants
